mapper.delete: DELETE FROM moka.commentrelation WHERE 1 = 1 AND commentId = #{commentId} AND userId = #{userId} AND comType = #{comType}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(cr.id) FROM moka.commentrelation AS cr WHERE 1 = 1 AND cr.commentId = #{commentId} AND cr.userId = #{userId} AND cr.comType = #{comType}

update.if: UPDATE moka.comment SET comment.praised = comment.praised - 1 WHERE comment.id = #{id};
UPDATE moka.comment SET comment.praised = comment.praised + 1 WHERE comment.id = #{id};
UPDATE moka.comment SET comment.review = comment.review - 1 WHERE comment.id = #{id};
UPDATE moka.comment SET comment.review = comment.review + 1 WHERE comment.id = #{id};
UPDATE moka.comment SET comment.forward = comment.forward - 1 WHERE comment.id = #{id};
UPDATE moka.comment SET comment.forward = comment.forward + 1 WHERE comment.id = #{id};
